name: utf8tocp
summary: converts UTF-8 text files to other codepages and back
short_description: utf8tocp is a console mode tool able to convert a UTF-8 text file into other codepages. It is also able to perform the reverse operation. utf8tocp is written in pure and simple ANSI C, should compile cleanly on virtually any possible platform. Positively verified on Linux, FreeBSD (using gcc) and FreeDOS (using Turbo C).
